_header: This ender day befell a strife
_description: The Old Man Worsted — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Hey howe / Sely men God helpe yowe’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
This indrys day be fel a stryfeTo twex an oldman & hys
                    wyfe…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines: …Goo ondyr & ȝe schall weteWith hey ho[w]
BodEngPoete1.Note: 2 quatrains aaab and 2 three-line stanzas aab.
